bioAsHtml: Stijn worked as a consultant for big brand financial institutions. After spending some time on the mainframe, he became a partner at WebComrades and co-founded the sports startup Panenka76. Both companies build mobile experiences for more than 1 million users. Here, he redeveloped his interest in the JVM and all things Clojure. Stijn's expertise lies in building real-time, high-performance backends.

acceptedTalks.title: BeClojure School: A gentle introduction to Clojure

bio: Stijn worked as a consultant for big brand financial institutions. After spending some time on the mainframe, he became a partner at WebComrades and co-founded the sports startup Panenka76. Both companies build mobile experiences for more than 1 million users. Here, he redeveloped his interest in the JVM and all things Clojure. Stijn's expertise lies in building real-time, high-performance backends.
